SEARCH
Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.retriever

Class StructureRetriever

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.structures.retriever.StructureRetriever
public abstract sealed class StructureRetriever extends Object
Represents a way to retrieve structures. It may be referenced by its name, its UID, or the object(s) itself.

Once a StructureRetriever is created, it can be used to retrieve the structure(s) it references using any of the getStructure methods.

For example: 


 // Get the referenced structure if there is exactly 1 match.
 final CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> result =
     structureRetriever.getStructure();

 // Get the referenced structure if there is exactly 1 match that the player is an admin of.
 final CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> result =
     structureRetriever.getStructure(player, PermissionLevel.ADMIN);

 // Get the referenced structure that the player is the creator of. If there is more than 1 match, the player
 // will be asked to select one (if supported).
 final CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> result =
     structureRetriever.getStructureInteractive(player, PermissionLevel.CREATOR);

 // Get all structures that match the description.
 final CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> result =
     structureRetriever.getStructures();

 // Get all structures that match the description and that the player is a user of.
 final CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> result =
     structureRetriever.getStructures(player, PermissionLevel.USER);

  • Constructor Details

    • StructureRetriever

  • Method Details

    • getStructure

      public abstract CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructure()
      Gets the structure that is referenced by this StructureRetriever if exactly 1 structure matches the description.

      In case the structure is referenced by its name, there may be more than one match (names are not unique). When this happens, no structures are returned.

      getStructureInteractive(IPlayer, PermissionLevel) can be used to interactively request the user to select a structure if more than 1 match is found.

      Returns:
      The AbstractStructure if it can be found.

    • getStructure

      public abstract CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructure(IPlayer player, PermissionLevel permissionLevel)
      Gets the structure that is referenced by this StructureRetriever and owned by the provided player if exactly 1 structure matches the description.

      In case the structure is referenced by its name, there may be more than one match (names are not unique). When this happens, no structures are returned.

      getStructureInteractive(IPlayer, PermissionLevel) can be used to interactively request the user to select a structure if more than 1 match is found.

      Parameters:
      player - The IPlayer that owns the structure.
      permissionLevel - The maximum PermissionLevel of the player for the structure to be returned.
      Returns:
      The AbstractStructure if it can be found.

    • getStructure

      public CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructure(ICommandSender commandSender, PermissionLevel permissionLevel)
      Gets the structure referenced by this StructureRetriever.

      If the ICommandSender is a player, see getStructure(IPlayer, PermissionLevel), otherwise see getStructure().

      getStructureInteractive(IPlayer, PermissionLevel) can be used to interactively request the user to select a structure if more than 1 match is found.

      Parameters:
      commandSender - The ICommandSender for whom to retrieve the structures.
      permissionLevel - The maximum PermissionLevel of the player for the structure to be returned.
      Returns:
      The structure referenced by this StructureRetriever.

    • getStructureInteractive

      public CompletableFuture<Optional<AbstractStructure>> getStructureInteractive(IPlayer player, PermissionLevel permissionLevel)
      Attempts to retrieve a structure from its specification (see getStructure(IPlayer, PermissionLevel)).

      If more than 1 match was found, the player will be asked to specify which one they asked for specifically.

      The amount of time to wait (when required) is determined by IConfig.specificationTimeout().

      See DelayedStructureSpecificationInputRequest.

      Not every implementation of StructureRetriever supports this method, in which case it will return the same as getStructure(IPlayer, PermissionLevel) (e.g. when retrieving a structure by its UID).

      Parameters:
      player - The player for whom to get the structure.
      permissionLevel - The maximum PermissionLevel of the player for the structure to be returned.
      Returns:
      The structure as specified by this StructureRetriever and with user input in case more than one match was found.

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures()
      Gets all structures referenced by this StructureRetriever.
      Returns:
      All structures referenced by this StructureRetriever.

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures(IPlayer player, PermissionLevel permissionLevel)
      Gets all structures referenced by this StructureRetriever where the provided player is a (co)owner of with any permission level.
      Parameters:
      player - The IPlayer that owns all matching structures.
      permissionLevel - The maximum PermissionLevel of the player for the structures to be returned.
      Returns:
      All structures referenced by this StructureRetriever.

    • getStructures

      public CompletableFuture<List<AbstractStructure>> getStructures(ICommandSender commandSender, PermissionLevel permissionLevel)
      Gets all structures referenced by this StructureRetriever.

      If the ICommandSender is a player, see getStructures(IPlayer, PermissionLevel), otherwise see getStructures().

      Parameters:
      commandSender - The ICommandSender for whom to retrieve the structures.
      permissionLevel - The maximum PermissionLevel of the player for the structures to be returned.
      Returns:
      The structures referenced by this StructureRetriever.
